snippet.title: Puzzle With Your Friends - Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/620650/Puzzle_With_Your_Friends/

Puzzle With Your Friends is a Co-Op/Multiplayer puzzle-game, coming with a wide range of awesome paintings from indie-games and artists.

In Puzzle With Your Friends you can puzzle alone, with and also against your friends via the internet! Unique motives from different games and artists are available.

Original music by Michael Cherdchupan
Compete using leaderboards for all puzzles
Integrated lobby- and chat-system for multiplayer-mode
Comes with trading cards, achievements and emoticons
Languages: English, German, Russian & French

------------------
Puzzle With Your Friends (2018)
Developer: Stromsky
Publisher: Stromsky
